def_en: A wildcat is a cat which is very fierce and lives especially in mountains and forests.

def_cn: (罢工)未经工会同意的，自发进行的
def_en: A wildcat strike happens suddenly, as a result of a decision by a group of workers, and is not officially approved by a trade union.

def_cn: (计划、项目或生意等)冒险的，计划不周详的
def_en: A wildcat scheme, project, or business is risky and likely to fail, usually because there has not been enough planning.
